thread.title: BRIEF-XPO Logistics Expands Supply Chain Network In North America With Creation Of About 5,000 New Jobs

title: BRIEF-XPO Logistics Expands Supply Chain Network In North America With Creation Of About 5,000 New Jobs
text:
April 17, 2018 / 8:29 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-XPO Logistics Expands Supply Chain Network In North America With Creation Of About 5,000 New Jobs Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - XPO Logistics Inc: 
* XPO LOGISTICS INC - EXPANSION OF ITS SUPPLY CHAIN NETWORK IN NORTH AMERICA WITH CREATION OF APPROXIMATELY 5,000 NEW JOBS 
* XPO LOGISTICS INC - RECRUITMENT COINCIDES WITH MORE THAN 40 NEW LOGISTICS CUSTOMERS SIGNED BY XPO IN Q1 AND START OF PEAK FOOD AND BEVERAGE SEASON Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
